MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Easter Drylaw Gardens and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.48am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.34pm on Thursday 14th January 2021.
